channel.title: [PI] spawn bug on my server
channel.description:
Hello,
well im running a project insanity/exion based server and i was so sure that i had fixed cheatengine even tested my self...it doesnt work, Yet some1 is spawning items somehow and ruining my eco..
i cant figure out how he is doing this and how i would fix..? is there a way to still use cheatengine if its fixed i swear it doesnt work maybe a special shop ?
or is there another type of spawn bug for pi sources? i need help to fix this asap please

item.title: [PI] spawn bug on my server
item.dc:creator: @k_l_4_w_s k l 4 w s
item.description:
@k_l_4_w_s wrote:

He’s most likely using “fuckyouss” as a password and “i i i i” as a username.
This is an exploit added by the creator of the PI base himself.
I’m not sure HOW to fix it, but I’m sure Google DOES.

Note: Making “Fuckyouss” A password will give a hidden ip as “0.0.0.0” Which is UN-BANNABLE!
If I find a way on how to fix it, I will let you know.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] spawn bug on my server
item.dc:creator: @dgk_all_day1 dgk_all_day
item.description:
@dgk_all_day1 wrote:

[quote=“Ddragonimp, post:8, topic:373555”]make sure you enforce your client…

Delta has the ability to unsure about PI

if (server.enforceClient && !officialClient) { println("Invalid client!"); returnCode = 12; disconnected = true; return; } else { [/quote]
how where would i put this on pi? ive never had to add anything liek this

item.title: [PI] spawn bug on my server
item.dc:creator: @dgk_all_day1 dgk_all_day
item.description:
@dgk_all_day1 wrote:

[quote=“j19283746, post:4, topic:373555”]They’re many dupes on PI.

  1. Trade dupe
  2. Wildy dupe
  3. Logout dupe
  4. Dropping dupe
  5. Telekinetic Grab dupe
    P.S. I siggest getting a better server base. It might not be as stable, but at least dupes are fixed since you are striving towards a stable economy.[/quote]
    all of these i have patched - and i also patched cheat engine - it doesnt work the most buying from the shops yet some1 still manages to hack somehow and spawn items… so i took my client download offline and have made every1 play my webclient now so i hope that fixes the spawn dupes

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] spawn bug on my server
item.dc:creator: @Ddragonimp Ddragonimp
item.description:
@Ddragonimp wrote:

[quote=“Pest, post:5, topic:373555”][quote author=j19283746 link=topic=469563.msg3433388#msg3433388 date=1292548408]
They’re many dupes on PI.

  1. Trade dupe
  2. Wildy dupe
  3. Logout dupe
  4. Dropping dupe
  5. Telekinetic Grab dupe
    P.S. I siggest getting a better server base. It might not be as stable, but at least dupes are fixed since you are striving towards a stable economy.
    [/quote] You left out #6 The biggest used one… Cheat Engine store dupe :D[/quote]

Delta has the same issue with the store i fixed it on my source but players couldn’t buy more then 1 of an item or else it would charge them 2.2b gold it was a simple fix because i made max gold 2.1b If the ItemId wasn’t in the store then charge them 2.2b really simple.

Read full topic
